questions.question: Which Amendment Act led to the repeal of Part VII of the Indian Constitution?
What was the primary purpose of Part VII before it was repealed?
options: To outline the rights of the states
To manage the territories of states in Part B
To provide for the establishment of municipalities
To define the powers of the Union government

questions.question: Which schedule was affected by the repeal of Part VII?
Which states were originally listed in Part B of the First Schedule before the repeal of Part VII?
options: States like Punjab, Rajasthan, and Mysore
Princely states like Hyderabad and Mysore
